verses.verse: And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when Ehud <S%H164><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, that reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Hazor <S%H2674><s%>; the captain <S%H8269><s%> of whose host <S%H6635><s%> was Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, which lived <S%H3427><s%> in Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the Nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for he had nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> he mightily <S%H2394><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Deborah <S%H1683><s%>, a prophetess <S%H5031><s%>, the wife <S%H802><s%> of Lapidoth <S%H3941><s%>, she judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>.

And she lived <S%H3427><s%> under the palm tree <S%H8560><s%> of Deborah <S%H1683><s%> between Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to her for judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

And she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> out of Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>–naphtali, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, Has not the Lord God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H3212><s%>, Go and draw <S%H4900><s%> toward mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> with you ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>?

And I will draw <S%H4900><s%> unto you to the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%>'s army <S%H6635><s%>, with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his multitude <S%H1995><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And Barak <S%H1301><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H3212><s%>, If you will go with me <S%H1980><s%>, then I will go: but if you will not go <S%H3212><s%> with me <S%H3212><s%>, then I will not go.

And she said <S%H559><s%>, I will surely <S%H1980><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> with you <S%H657><s%>: nevertheless the journey <S%H1870><s%> that you take <S%H1980><s%> shall not be for your honor <S%H8597><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall sell <S%H4376><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%>. And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> with Barak <S%H1301><s%> to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>; and he went up <S%H5927><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> at his feet <S%H7272><s%>: and Deborah <S%H1683><s%> went up with him <S%H5927><s%>.

Now Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>, which was of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the father in law <S%H2859><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, had separated <S%H6504><s%> himself from the Kenites <S%H7017><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> unto the plain <S%H436><s%> of Zaanaim <S%H6815><s%>, which is by Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.
And they showed <S%H5046><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> that Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> to mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>.

And Sisera <S%H5516><s%> gathered together <S%H2199><s%> all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, even nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H2800><s%>, from Harosheth of the Nations <S%H1471><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> of Kishon <S%H7028><s%>.

And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Barak <S%H1301><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%>; for this is the day <S%H3117><s%> in which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%>: is not the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you So Barak <S%H1301><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> from mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> defeated <S%H2000><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, and all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and all his host <S%H4264><s%>, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%>; so that Sisera <S%H5516><s%> lighted down <S%H3381><s%> off his chariot <S%H4818><s%>, and fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%>.

But Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and after the host <S%H4264><s%>, unto Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the Nations <S%H1471><s%>: and all the host <S%H4264><s%> of Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and there was not a man <S%H259><s%> left <S%H7604><s%>.

But Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%> to the tent <S%H168><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>: for there was peace <S%H7965><s%> between Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>.

And Jael <S%H3278><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5493><s%>, Turn in, my lord <S%H113><s%>, turn in <S%H5493><s%> to me <S%H3372><s%>; fear not <S%H5493><s%>. And when he had turned in unto her into the tent <S%H168><s%>, she covered <S%H3680><s%> him with a mantle <S%H8063><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H4592><s%>, Give me, I pray you, a little water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>; for I am thirsty <S%H6770><s%>. And she opened <S%H6605><s%> a bottle <S%H4997><s%> of milk <S%H2461><s%>, and gave him drink <S%H8248><s%>, and covered him <S%H3680><s%>.

Again he said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H5975><s%>, Stand in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and it shall be <S%H376><s%>, when any man does come <S%H935><s%> and inquire <S%H7592><s%> of you <S%H559><s%>, and say, Is there <S%H3426><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> here <S%H3426><s%>? that you shall say <S%H559><s%>, No.

Then Jael <S%H3278><s%> Heber <S%H2268><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a nail <S%H3489><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and took <S%H7760><s%> an hammer <S%H4718><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> softly <S%H3814><s%> unto him <S%H8628><s%>, and struck the nail <S%H3489><s%> into his temples <S%H7541><s%>, and fastened <S%H6795><s%> it into the ground <S%H776><s%>: for he was fast asleep <S%H7290><s%> and weary <S%H5774><s%>. So he died <S%H4191><s%>.

And <S%H1301><s%>, behold, as Barak pursued <S%H7291><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, Jael <S%H3278><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Come, and I will show <S%H7200><s%> you the man <S%H376><s%> whom you seekest <S%H1245><s%>. And when he came <S%H935><s%> into her tent <S%H5516><s%>, behold, Sisera lay <S%H5307><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%>, and the nail <S%H3489><s%> was in his temples <S%H7541><s%>.

So God <S%H430><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> prospered <S%H3212><s%>, and prevailed <S%H7186><s%> against Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, until they had destroyed <S%H3772><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.
